example.eg: Stretch as high as you can and pick that apple from the tree.
example.egtrans: 尽量把手伸高，将树上的那个苹果摘下来。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 伸直, 伸长, 伸出

example.eg: Sadie turned off her alarm clock and stretched.
example.egtrans: 萨蒂关掉了闹钟，伸展了身体。

example.eg: We have to stretch the rope to its full length.
example.egtrans: 我们得把绳子拉至最长。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 拉长, 拉直, 拉紧

example.eg: The shoes will fit once they've been stretched.
example.egtrans: 鞋子撑大之后就合脚了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使变大, 拉长, 撑大

example.eg: I need to stretch my legs before I run the race.
example.egtrans: 比赛之前我要拉伸一下腿部肌肉。

example.eg: The fabric will stretch when it's wet, and shrink as it dries.
example.egtrans: 这种材料遇水会舒展，干燥时会收缩。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 展开, 伸展, 舒展

example.eg: My language skills don't stretch to Japanese.
example.egtrans: 我的语言技能没有延伸到日语。

example.eg: I'm afraid my conversational skills in Italian don't stretch to negotiating house prices.
example.egtrans: 恐怕我意大利语的会话技巧还不足以谈房价。

example.eg: It's important to stretch before and after exercising.
example.egtrans: 锻炼前后做伸展运动很重要。

example.eg: She put on stretch pants and began to do yoga.
example.egtrans: 她换上有弹性的裤子，然后开始做瑜伽。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有松紧性的, 有弹性的

example.eg: I'm going to the bedroom for a stretch after lunch.
The stretch up ahead is flat and straight.
example.egtrans: 前方的一段路笔直且平坦。

example.eg: Let's rest for a stretch after we finish the job.
example.egtrans: 完成工作后，让后我们休息一段时间。

dsense.name: a stretch, a bit of a stretch

example.eg: It's a bit of a stretch to call her a teacher. She helps out in the classroom occasionally, that's all.
example.egtrans: 称呼她为老师有些夸张了。她只是偶尔在课堂上帮帮忙，仅此而已。

example.eg: The judge sent him down for a ten-year stretch.
example.egtrans: 法官宣判他的刑期是10年。

example.eg: A stretch always helps me wake up in the mornings.
example.egtrans: 舒展四肢总是有助于我在早晨清醒过来。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 拉伸四肢, 舒展四肢

example.eg: The students hired a stretch for graduation day.
It's always good to have some clothes with a bit of stretch in them, just in case you put on weight.
example.egtrans: 为以防自己变胖，备一些有松紧性的衣物总是个好主意。

example.eg: I always do a few stretches before I go for my run.
example.egtrans: 跑步前，我总是会做几个伸展运动。

dsense.name: stretch [sth]⇒
dsense.guideword: figurative (money: eke out) (延长使用日期)

example.eg: We have to stretch our money and make it last all week.
The turkey stretched its wings and tried to fly, but was too heavy to leave the ground.
I just like to stretch out on the sofa and relax in front of the TV after a hard day at the office.
example.egtrans: 在办公室辛苦工作一天之后，我喜欢在电视机前舒展四肢地躺在沙发上。

example.eg: Although I can read English for hours, I can only manage about ten pages of French at a stretch.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一口气地, 连续不断地, 不休息地

example.eg: The recipe says it's enough for four people, but I think it will feed five at a stretch.

dsense.name: homestretch, also UK: home stretch, home straight

trans_examp.trans_cn: 终点直道, 直线跑道, 决胜跑道

dsense.name: the homestretch (US), the home stretch, the home straight (UK)
dsense.guideword: (final stages of race or journey) (比赛、旅程)

example.eg: As they approached the home stretch, the two runners engaged in a thrilling race to the finish line.

dsense.name: homestretch, also UK: home stretch, home straight
the homestretch (US), the home stretch, the home straight (UK)

example.eg: This project has taken almost two years of hard work by the team, but we are now in the home stretch.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 最后阶段, 最后一搏
妊娠纹, 皮肤扩张纹

example.eg: He did a stretch of time in prison.
If you stretch out your arm, you can probably reach me.
example.egtrans: 如果你充分伸展你的手臂，你也许就能够到我了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 舒展四肢躺着, 四仰八叉地躺着
